name: milligram-scss
description: A minimalist CSS framework on SCSS version.
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -rf src/* dist
scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style expanded src/milligram.scss test/milligram.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/milligram.scss test/milligram.min.css
scripts.build: run-s lint scss autoprefixer copy banner
